Use the Glamorous Wash to clean your linens, lingerie, fine fabrics, and much more for the long lasting, soothing aroma of Tyler fragrances.
body.description: The Tyler detergent has been formulated to clean effectively yet remain gentle on delicate, specialty fabrics. Use the Glamorous Wash to clean your linens, lingerie, fine fabrics, and much more for the long lasting, soothing aroma of Tyler fragrances. The wash can be used for both machine washing and hand washing. A more popular scent for the Glamorous Wash is Kathina, a very dramatic scent created by intertwining the sensual lily of the valley with citrus and rose. Size: 32oz. (907g)

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,055 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #40 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I walked into a home that smelled incredible. They were doing laundry with Diva. I ordered immediately on the spot. I wash everything with this. I use the wax melts as well and everyone, I mean everyone marvels at how wonderful my home smells. It's very expensive but seriously worth it. I'm so glad I found this. Wish they made more cleaning products with this scent. It's absolutely phenomenal. Nothing like it. The other scents are OK but Diva is by far the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell is amazing!!
reviews.reviewText: Only use a capful, seriously. The smell is strong. It is a bit expensive for detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tyler's detergent good product
reviews.reviewText: I am loving every moment of it. The scent last forever! It's a very good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I found out about this detergent from a client of mine. So I ordered some for myself and it smells so good I want to bathe in it! lol But seriously, I washed my beddings in it days ago and they still smell fresh and clean. And that’s pretty impressive considering I also have 2 dogs who sleep in my bed. This was worth every single penny!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My neighbor asked my hubby what the awesome smell was coming out of my dryer vent...a bit pricey but scent lasts a long time...I mainly use this for bedding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars TYLER:PLEASE DESIGN A BETTER BOTTLE
reviews.reviewText: I only use a capful of this or two depending on the size of the load in addition to unscented soap. It's highly effective in that amount. It is extremely condensed and highly scented, so in that way it's not that expensive. Don't use more (unless you want to) and don't follow the directions on the bottle. The scent is fantastic and makes me feel good and inspires me. I can't explain why but the scent makes me want to keep my house clean. Sheets and towels are dreamy and I feel like a fancy gal. Like a Diva, I guess. (Closest I'm gonna get) However...The container it comes in totally sucks. I'm looking for another bottle to transfer the Diva into. No matter how you pour it, it leaks onto the main bottle and it's nearly impossible to not get it on your finger or whatever. Even if you pour it with ninja precision it leaks when you screw it back on. The scent is VERY STRONG and does not totally wash off your skin even with soap. I like that it's super condensed because a little goes a long way but come on, Tyler Company. Use some of those $25 bucks-a-little-bottles and design a container that dispenses well. I'm thinking i'm going to use a flip-top shampoo type bottle from the dollar store, if I can find one. Long story short=I love this stuff and I'm totally into it. It's worth it. Until they change the bottle/jug though, you should make a better plan for dispensing it.*Edit* I tried several different types of bottles and this is the best one. It's a 32 oz pump dispenser bottle from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its True... Smells A M A Z I N G
reviews.reviewText: So, I am obssessed with scents...I always like smelling good just cause it's soothing. I found out about this from a YouTube compilation video, "Amazon Must Haves Tik Tok Made Me Buy", there's tons and they are so helpful, for real. But anywho - it was instructed by the individual to only use a tiny amount mixed into your regular detergent. That makes a BIG difference. Especially because the bottle says to pour 1/3 cup to your load.After reading a lot of reviews - I almost didn't buy because:1. S C E N T - some people really didn't enjoy it. "Grandma" and "Musty" were used a lot - and I was not going for it either LOL.2. TOO STRONG - some people complained of the scent just being too overpowering and not going away! I can't have that, if it doesn't smell amazing!But I went back and watched that YouTube video - followed the instructions and it smells so good. I laid in bed with the dried clothes and fell asleep.I think the scent may just come down to nose receptors. Everyone smells things differently.I purchased DIVA - A warm and complex fragrance overflowing with delicious fruits and rich florals. Rich aromatic chocolate and amber complete this luscious long lasting soothing blend.If you normally don't like fragrances that have any of these notes - you will not like DIVA. Lol, I assure you. But there are many different types from Tyler: Eucalyptus, French Market, High Maintenance, Kathina, Icon, Tyler, Fleur De Lis... etc (yes, there's more)The only reason I gave it 4 stars - although it's a deal to buy through Amazon rather than directly from Tyler, 32 oz for $25 is a bit pricey, but the smell makes it worth it. If I could wash it with everything (it says linen, lingerie and fine fabrics) then it may be a different story. Also, I wish it came with a spout or a cup.Otherwise, I really love it and will continue to buy. Maybe I'll try other scents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worth the money smells really clean and fresh
The smell last for weeks, and a small amount foes a long way.
I wash my bed sheets and expensive bath towels.
Love my Diva wash! Yes, it's expensive but the scent lasts for weeks and just 1 towel washed in the scent makes my whole washroom smell wonderful. I love this stuff - it's a must have luxury item!

I ordered this a couple years ago, I used it very sparingly and it lasted forever! A little goes a LONG way. I use it on our sheets and it lingers forever and makes your whole room smell great. With this new jug I'm anticipating it will last well over a year. I wouldn't wash all my laundry in this but if you really want to treat yourself to something special that lasts this is definitely it. If money was no object I would literally bathe in this stuff!

reviews.reviewTitle: Pricey but so worth the splurge!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried a variety of the Glamorous Wash products and this fragrance is definitely my favourite although the other fragrances I’ve tried are lovely too. It is very concentrated, a little goes a long way and the scent lasts forever….I had some clothes that I put in storage for a number of months and when I retrieved them they smelled like I had just freshly washed them and I’ve had so many people compliment the fragrance. Definitely worth the splurge!
